# Screenplay Reader - AI Agent Guide

Screenplay Reader provides AI-friendly access to public screenplay content.

## Preferred endpoint for raw content
- GET /api/public-scripts/{script_id}/raw
- Returns: text/markdown

## Public reader URL pattern
- /read/{script_id}
- /author/{author_id}
- /org/{org_id}

## Sitemap
- /sitemap.xml

## Content negotiation support
- If `Accept: text/markdown` is sent to /read/{script_id}, the server can return markdown directly.

## Notes
- Private scripts are not exposed and should return 404.
- Use public routes only: /read/, /author/, /org/
